snippet: Monica Prieto pleaded for the release of her husband, Javier Espinosa, a correspondent for the Spanish newspaper El Mundo, and Ricardo García Vilanova, a photographer abducted with him.
abstract: Monica Prieto pleaded for the release of her husband, Javier Espinosa, a correspondent for the Spanish newspaper El Mundo, and Ricardo García Vilanova, a photographer abducted with him.

headline.main: Wife Appeals for Release of Journalist Kidnapped in Syria
